tool_description: Make bitcoin/ethereum transactions and get real-time data.
name: Coinbase
title: Coinbase

api_list.name: getExchangeRates
api_list.description: Get current exchange rates.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: Base currency (default: USD).

api_list.name: cancelRequestMoney
api_list.description: Lets a user cancel a money request. Scopes: wallet:transactions:request

api_list.name: commitBuy
api_list.description: Completes a buy that is created in commit: false state. Scopes: wallet:buys:create

api_list.name: commitDeposit
api_list.description: Completes a deposit that is created in commit: false state. Scopes: wallet:deposits:create

api_list.name: commitSell
api_list.description: Completes a sell that is created in commit: false state. Scopes: wallet:sells:create

api_list.name: commitWithdrawal
api_list.description: Completes a withdrawal that is created in commit: false state. Scopes: wallet:withdrawals:create

api_list.name: completeRequestMoney
api_list.description: Lets the recipient of a money request complete the request by sending money to the user who requested the money. Scopes: wallet:transactions:request

api_list.name: createAccount
api_list.description: Creates a new account for user. Scopes: wallet:accounts:create

api_list.name: createAddress
api_list.description: Creates a new address for an account. Scopes: wallet:addresses:create

api_list.name: createCheckout
api_list.description: Creates a new merchant order checkout product. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:create

optional_parameters.name: style
optional_parameters.description: Style of a payment button. One of: buy_now_large, buy_now_small, donation_large, donation_small ,custom_large, custom_small.

optional_parameters.name: customerDefinedAmount
optional_parameters.description: Allow customer to define the amount they are paying.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: More detailed description of the checkout order.

optional_parameters.name: successUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to which the customer is redirected after successful payment.

optional_parameters.name: cancelUrl
optional_parameters.description: URL to which the customer is redirected after they have canceled a payment.

optional_parameters.name: notificationsUrl
optional_parameters.description: Checkout specific notification URL.

optional_parameters.name: autoRedirect
optional_parameters.description: Auto-redirect users to success or cancel url after payment.

optional_parameters.name: collectShippingAddress
optional_parameters.description: Collect shipping address from customer.

optional_parameters.name: collectPhoneNumber
optional_parameters.description: Collect phone number from customer.

optional_parameters.name: collectEmail
optional_parameters.description: Collect email address from customer.

optional_parameters.name: metadata
optional_parameters.description: JSON Object. Developer defined key value pairs.

optional_parameters.name: collectCountry
optional_parameters.description: Collect country from customer.

optional_parameters.name: amountPresets
optional_parameters.description: Array of Strings, allow customer to select one of the predefined amount values.

api_list.name: createCheckoutOrder
api_list.description: Creates a new order for a checkout. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:create

api_list.name: createOrder
api_list.description: Creates a new merchant order. Scopes: wallet:orders:create

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: More detailed description of the order.

optional_parameters.name: notificationsUrl
optional_parameters.description: Order specific notification URL.

optional_parameters.name: metadata
optional_parameters.description: JSON Object. Developer defined key value pairs.

api_list.name: deleteAccount
api_list.description: Removes user’s account. Scopes: wallet:accounts:delete

api_list.name: depositFunds
api_list.description: Deposits user-defined amount of funds to a fiat account. Scopes: wallet:deposits:create

required_parameters.name: paymentMethod
required_parameters.description: The ID of the payment method that should be used for the deposit.

optional_parameters.name: commit
optional_parameters.description: If set to false, this deposit will not be immediately completed.

api_list.name: getAccessToken
api_list.description: Geta access token.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: A one-time use code that may be exchanged for a bearer token.

required_parameters.name: redirectUri
required_parameters.description: URL in your app where users will be sent after authorization.

api_list.name: getAccounts
api_list.description: Lists current user’s accounts to which the authentication method has access to. Scope: wallet:accounts:read

api_list.name: getAddressTransactions
api_list.description: List transactions that have been sent to a specific address. Scopes: wallet:transactions:read

api_list.name: getAddresses
api_list.description: Lists addresses for an account. Scopes: wallet:addresses:read

api_list.name: getBuyPrice
api_list.description: Get the total price to buy one bitcoin or ether.

api_list.name: getBuys
api_list.description: Lists buys for an account. Scopes: wallet:buys:read

api_list.name: getCheckoutOrders
api_list.description: Lists checkout product’s orders. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:read

api_list.name: getCheckouts
api_list.description: Lists current user’s checkouts. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:read

api_list.name: getCurrencies
api_list.description: List known currencies.

api_list.name: getCurrentTime
api_list.description: Get the API server time.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://CoinbasedimasV1.p.rapidapi.com/getCurrentTime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "CoinbasedimasV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://CoinbasedimasV1.p.rapidapi.com/getCurrentTime"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "CoinbasedimasV1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getDeposits
api_list.description: Lists deposits for an account. Scopes: wallet:deposits:read

api_list.name: getMe
api_list.description: Get current user’s public information. Scope: wallet:user:read,wallet:user:email

api_list.name: getMyAuthInfo
api_list.description: Get current user’s authorization information including granted scopes.

api_list.name: getNotifications
api_list.description: Lists notifications where the current user was the subscriber. Scopes: wallet:notifications:read

api_list.name: getOrders
api_list.description: Lists the current user’s (merchant) orders. Scopes: wallet:orders:read

api_list.name: getPaymentMethods
api_list.description: Lists current user’s payment methods. Scopes: wallet:payment-methods:read

api_list.name: getSellPrice
api_list.description: Get the total price to sell one bitcoin or ether.

api_list.name: getSells
api_list.description: Lists sells for an account. Scopes: wallet:sells:read

api_list.name: getSingleAccount
api_list.description: Show current user’s account. Scopes: wallet:accounts:read

api_list.name: getSingleAddress
api_list.description: GetSingleAddress. Scopes: wallet:addresses:read

api_list.name: getSingleBuy
api_list.description: Show an individual buy. Scopes: wallet:buys:read

api_list.name: getSingleCheckout
api_list.description: Show current user’s checkout. Scopes: wallet:checkouts:read

api_list.name: getSingleDeposit
api_list.description: Show an individual deposit. Scopes: wallet:deposits:read

api_list.name: getSingleMerchant
api_list.description: Get any merchant’s information with their ID.

api_list.name: getSingleNotification
api_list.description: Show a notification for which the current user was a subsciber. Scopes: wallet:notifications:read

api_list.name: getSingleOrder
api_list.description: Show current merchant order. Scopes: wallet:orders:read

api_list.name: getSinglePaymentMethod
api_list.description: Show current user’s payment method. Scopes: wallet:payment-methods:read

api_list.name: getSingleSell
api_list.description: Show an individual sell. Scopes: wallet:sells:read

api_list.name: updateMe
api_list.description: Modify current user and their preferences. Scope: wallet:user:update

optional_parameters.name: timeZone
optional_parameters.description: Time zone.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: User’s public name.

optional_parameters.name: nativeCurrency
optional_parameters.description: Local currency used to display amounts converted from BTC.

api_list.name: getSingleTransaction
api_list.description: Show an individual transaction for an account. Scopes: wallet:transactions:read

api_list.name: getSingleWithdrawal
api_list.description: Show an individual withdrawal. Scopes: wallet:withdrawals:read

api_list.name: getSpotPrice
api_list.description: Get the current market price for bitcoin.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: Specify date for historic spot price in format YYYY-MM-DD (UTC).

api_list.name: getTransactions
api_list.description: Lists account’s transactions. Scopes: wallet:transactions:read

api_list.name: getUser
api_list.description: Get any user’s public information with their ID.

api_list.name: getWithdrawals
api_list.description: Lists withdrawals for an account. Scopes: wallet:withdrawals:read

api_list.name: nextPage
api_list.description: Retrieve next page for paginated blocks.

required_parameters.name: nextUri
required_parameters.description: Next page Uri, from pagination object in response.

api_list.name: placeBuyOrder
api_list.description: Buys a user-defined amount of bitcoin or ethereum. Scopes: wallet:buys:create

optional_parameters.name: paymentMethod
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the payment method that should be used for the buy.

optional_parameters.name: total
optional_parameters.description: Buy amount with fees (alternative to amount).

optional_parameters.name: agreeBtcAmountVaries
optional_parameters.description: Whether or not you would still like to buy if you have to wait for your money to arrive to lock in a price.

optional_parameters.name: commit
optional_parameters.description: If set to false, this buy will not be immediately completed.

optional_parameters.name: quote
optional_parameters.description: If set to true, response will return an unsave buy for detailed price quote.

api_list.name: placeSellOrder
api_list.description: Sells a user-defined amount of bitcoin or ethereum. Scopes: wallet:sells:create

optional_parameters.name: agreeBtcAmountVaries
optional_parameters.description: Whether or not you would still like to sell if you have to wait for your money to arrive to lock in a price.

optional_parameters.name: total
optional_parameters.description: Sell amount with fees.

optional_parameters.name: paymentMethod
optional_parameters.description: The ID of the payment method that should be used for the sell.

optional_parameters.name: quote
optional_parameters.description: f set to true, response will return an unsave sell for detailed price quote.

api_list.name: refreshAccessToken
api_list.description: Refresh access token.

required_parameters.name: refreshToken
required_parameters.description: The refresh token retrieved during the initial request for an access token.

api_list.name: refundOrder
api_list.description: Refunds an order. Scopes: wallet:orders:refund

required_parameters.name: refundAddress
required_parameters.description: Must be a valid bitcoin address.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description: The currency to issue the refund in.

api_list.name: requestMoney
api_list.description: Requests money from an email address. Scopes: wallet:transactions:request

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Notes to be included in the email that the recipient receives.

api_list.name: resendMoneyRequest
api_list.description: Lets the user resend a money request. Scopes: wallet:transactions:request

api_list.name: revokeAccessToken
api_list.description: RevokeAccessToken.

api_list.name: sendMoney
api_list.description: Send funds to a bitcoin address, ethereum address, or email address. Scopes: wallet:transactions:send

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: A bitcoin address, ethereum address, or an email of the recipient.

optional_parameters.name: skipNotifications
optional_parameters.description: Don’t send notification emails for small amounts.

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Notes to be included in the email that the recipient receives.

optional_parameters.name: idem
optional_parameters.description: A token to ensure idempotence.

optional_parameters.name: fee
optional_parameters.description: Transaction fee in BTC if you would like to pay it.

api_list.name: setAccountAsPrimary
api_list.description: Promote an account as primary account. Scopes: wallet:accounts:update

api_list.name: transferAccountsMoney
api_list.description: Transfer bitcoin or ethereum between two of a user’s accounts. Scopes: wallet:transactions:transfer

optional_parameters.name: description
optional_parameters.description: Notes to be included in the transfer.

api_list.name: updateAccount
api_list.description: UpdateAccount. Scopes: wallet:accounts:update

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Account name

api_list.name: withdrawFunds
api_list.description: Withdraws user-defined amount of funds from a fiat account. Scopes: wallet:withdrawals:create

required_parameters.name: paymentMethod
required_parameters.description: The ID of the payment method that should be used for the withdrawal.

optional_parameters.name: commit
optional_parameters.description: If set to false, this withdrawal will not be immediately completed.
